name: The Labyrinth (itch) (Oliswed)
description:
Controls:

Control the camera view by moving the camera with your mouse.
W -  Walk forward.
S - Walk backwards.
A and D - Walk sideways.
Hold shift while moving to run.
Press space to jump.

The goal of the game is to reach the end of the maze indicated by a brown door.
There isn’t any death state or respawning in the game currently.

Ronja Jakobsson - Level designer, SFX and music.
Klara Pranke - Level designer, graphic artist.
Oliver Rågmo - Level designer, graphic artist.
Oliver Svensson - Project manager, level designer, lighting artist.
